titleStmt.title: A speech made by Sir William Scrogg, one of His Majesties Sergeants at Law, to the Right Honourable the Lord High Chancellor of England, at his admission to the place of one of His Majesties Justices of the Court of Common-Pleas
titleStmt.author: Scroggs, William, Sir, 1623?-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
